title: WARM ACOUSTIC
description: High-Quality Original Music from Professional Composers, designed for use in Video Games. Features 12 Original tracks, converted into 54 loops, tailor-made for Royalty-Free use in Video Games.
longDescription:
SOUNDCLOUD PREVIEW


Warm Acoustic is a High-Quality Music pack made by Pro Composers, Instrumentalists, and Producers, specially edited and curated for Video Games. The HUGE collection of 54 loops gives you full creative control over the music in your gaming product, like having the music producer in your back pocket, the same way as TV/Film producers and directors do.


========================

MASSIVE CONTENT

========================


From 12 original genuine artistic tracks, written by Pro Composers and all featuring Live Instruments, there are 142 Musical Elements for your project, including 54 seamless loops, with a massive 4 hours of play time! These can be used for different levels, menu screens, cutaways, and expansion content. 


========================

ADAPTABLE AND VERSATILE

========================


It’s likely the game you’re planning has different textures in different levels, dark ambient tones needed in some spaces, more mysterious melodies in others, then this pack gives you 54 1-3 minute loops to accomplish that. You can fill the still void of a menu screen with more melodic track versions, cut to a “pad only” mix in a different level to give a different feel. 


You have many options rather than just using the individual tracks supplied in the pack. This means you have more choices to get the exact sound that you want for the game you’re creating, and you can keep coming back to the pack again for your future releases.


========================

PRO LEVEL MUSIC, INDIE BUDGET

========================


The Music in this Pack has been made by Creators with masses of experience writing Music for High End Media, and has already clocked up thousands of hours on television broadcasts all over the world. The Quality of this Music product, greatly increases the Quality of your Games.


========================

STYLE AND FEEL 

========================


The music is in this pack is all warm, delicate, organic and heartwarming, filled with fingerpicked acoustic guitars, bright, melodic glockenspiels. Soft pianos, smooth strings, and deep bass guitars. Great for building warmth and calm in casual, adventures, children, RPG, and platformers, as well as for cutaways and backing to story scenes.


Check the full tracks on Soundcloud : https://soundcloud.com/matt-harvey-vgm/warm-acoustic-pack-preview


========================

FULL COLLECTION DETAILS

========================


• 117 original high-quality WAV tracks (16-bit / 44.1 kHz)

• 54 seamless loops based on the main version, all at least 1-2 minutes long.

• 4 hrs of music

• 2.51 GB of music

• Unlimited Royalty-Free license


========================

ABOUT THE COMPOSER :

========================


Matt Harvey has created production music for High End Media Productions for over a decade. He has written for 1000’s of television shows, movies, online streamers, and adverts. His music is heard all over the world by millions. He has a dedicated studio using £1000’s worth of equipment, guitars, hardware, and software. These music products are crafted by a dedicated professional with years of experience.


This collection is a great way to get Top Level Music into your project on an Indie Budget.
technicalDetails:
Features:

Number of Audio Wavs: 117

Number of Audio Cues: 117

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1Khz 16-bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 240

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Important/Additional Notes: Artwork created and used under license from Midjourney AI.
